title: Who is more famous, Taylor Swift or Ariana Grande? - Quora

response.answer_text: Taylor Swift is still to many people the biggest female pop superstar in the world. She is the second highest certified female musician ever with 210 Million units, Ariana has 70 Million To be a top10 female recording artist in history, measured by Album Equivalent Units you need to sell about 100 Million AEU, Taylor sold 93 Million AEU, Ariana 42 AEU. Taylors net worth is 400 Million $, Ariana Grandes is 150 Million $ Taylor is the biggest solo touring act of the decade with a gross of 910 Million $, had the second biggest tour by a female artist this decade and broke the record for highest grossing tour in US history. Ariana Grande has grossed 250 Million in her career. Taylor won 10 Grammys (2 AOTY), 23 Billboard Music awards and 29 AMA‘s. Ariana won 1 Grammy, 2 Billboards and 3 AMA‘s. In general Taylor won 350+ awards, Ariana won 140. Taylors RIAA album certification when updated: 49 platinum and 2 diamond discs, Ariana 13 Platinum discs. Taylor signed a 200 Million $ deal with republic, i doubt Ariana would even get a 100 Million $ contract as a free agent right now. Taylor is the most recognized songwriter of the decade, Ariana is an average songwriter. Ariana is doing good at the charts right now, but Taylor is a top10 member of the ALL TIME BB CHART Taylor is in all Madame Tussauds wax cabinets, got plaques on airports, she has an education center named by her in the Nashville country Hall of Fame, „The Taylor Swift Expirience“ was in the Grammy Hall of Fame, she has a banner at Staples Center for most sellouts, she can be seen at the Wall of Sound at the Wembley Stadium. Taylor won a face to face competition for the VEVO record on Youtube. Her video ME! was watched 10 Million times more than Ariana‘s video in the first 24 hours. Taylor was named top recording artist 2019, Ariana finished 6th on this chart. Now if you ask

Obviously, it's Taylor Swift. I'm not joking, sometimes I chose "celebrities" as a topic in small talks. I often got this reaction when I mentioned Ariana Grande, "Is she famous?". It's not so surprising. There are logical reasons behind this. Note : I'm not going to talk about them in "real life", simply because I don't know both of them. I'm just going to talk about something that I can clearly see from the internet. So here's why it's Taylor Swift. The most logical one is that Taylor Swift started her music carreer in 2006 (it's when her first song, "Tim McGraw", released) while Ariana Grande started her music carreer in 2011 (it's when her first song, "Put Your Hearts Up", released). Taylor had gained popularity and fame (in U.S.) at least 5 years before Ariana Grande even became relevant. You can tell by looking her Billboard Chart History on Hot Country Songs category. "Tim McGraw" peaked at #6 and stayed for 32 weeks in the chart. By the time Ariana Grande released her first album, "Yours Truly", Taylor Swift had already released her 4th album, "Red". One of Taylor Swift's single from that album, "We Are Never Ever Getting Back Together", even peaked at #1 on Billboard 100 category.
